resources.string: Already have an Account! Sign In
Do not have account? Create Now
Click on Your tin to Show/Edit your personal information
Tax Year is Primary Loop of Your Database. Enter Tax Year name carefully. Because it can not be edited later.
Area pay (if not included in taxable income earlier)
Employer’s contribution to a recognized provident fund
Interest accrued on a recognized provident fund
Deemed income for free furnished/ unfurnished accommodation
Contribution to deposit pension scheme (not exceeding allowable limit)
Investment in approved debenture or debenture stock, Stock or Shares
Contribution to provident fund to which Provident Fund Act, 1925 applies
Self contribution and employer’s contribution to Recognized Provident Fund
Contribution to Benevolent Fund and Group Insurance Premium
Eligible amount for rebate (the lesser of 14A, 14B or 14C
Total allowable investment, contribution, etc. (as in 13)

25% of the total income [excluding any income for which a tax exemption or a reduced rate is applicable under sub-section (4) of section 44 or any income from any source or sources mentioned in clause (a) of sub-section (2) of section 82C.
Amount of tax rebate calculated on eligible amount (Serial14) under section 44(2)(b)
The following schedules shall be the integral part of this return and must be annexed to return in the following cases:
Schedule 24A if you have income from Salaries
Schedule 24B if you have income from house property
Schedule 24C if you have income from business or profession
Schedule 24D if you claim tax rebate
Tick on the box(es) below if you are:
A parent/legal guardian of a person with disability
Income from business or profession (annex Schedule 24C)
Share of income from firm or AOP
Income of minor or spouse under section 43(4)
Interest or any other amount under the Ordinance (if any)
Tax deducted or collected at source (attach proof)
Adjustment of tax refund [mention assessment year(s) of refund]

Statement of assets, liabilities and expenses (IT-10B2016) and statement of life style expense (IT10BB2016) must be furnished with the return unless you are exempted from furnishing such statement(s) under section 80.
Proof of payments of tax, including advance tax and withholding tax and the proof of investment for tax rebate must be provided along with return.
Attach account statements and other documents where applicable
If you are a parent of a person with disability, has your spouse availed the extended tax exemption threshold? (tick one)
Are you required to submit a statement of assets, liabilities and expenses (IT-10B2016) under section 80(1)? (tick one)
Schedules annexed (tick all that are applicable)
Statements annexed (tick all that are applicable)
Other statements, documents, etc. attached (list all)
I solemnly declare that to the best of my knowledge and belief the information given in this return and statements and documents annexed or attached herewith are correct and complete.
